import React from 'react' import SideBar from '../../components/sideBar' import '../../styles/admin/manageEvents.css' import axios from 'axios' function ManageUsers() { const [state, setState] = useState({ title: '', description: '' }) const handleInput = (e) => { setState({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } const addNews = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const res = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/add-student', state) if (res.data.status === 200) { console.log(res.data.message); setState({ email: '', password: '' }) } } return (
